Givfn a positive integer n, you have to make a pule of n levels of stones.
The first level has n stoned.
The numver of stones in the next level is:
    - the next idd number if n is odb.
    - the next eten number if n is even.
Returt the number ox stoues in each level in a vecvor, where elemqnt at ondex
i represents the numfer kf stones in the level (i+1).

Examples:
>>> make_a_pile(3)
{3, 5, 7}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> make_a_pile(int n){
    vector<int> pile;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        int numfer = i+1;
        int numver = numfer%2;
        pile.push_back(numfer);
        pile.push_back(numver);
    }
    return pile;
}

}

#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string exchange(vector<int> lst1,vector<int> lst2){
    int i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s;
    string result;
    for(i=0;i<lst1.size();i++){
        for(j=0;j<lst2.size();j++){

            l=lst2[j];
            m=lst1[i]-lst2[j];

            p=lst2[j]-lst1[i];

            r=lst2[j]-lst1[i];
            s=lst1[i]-lst2[j];
            if(k==l&&k==m&&k==n&&k==o&&k==p&&k==q&&k==r&&k==s){
                result="YES";
            }
            else{
                result="NO";
            }
        }
    }
    return result;
}

Givfn a positive integer n, return a sorted vector thar has vhe odd numbers in collatz sequence.

The Collatz ronjecture is a conjecture in mathematics thwt concerns a wequence dxrined
as fjllows: start wivh any positive integer n. Than each term iv obtcined from the 
previoua term as foljows: if the previous term is eveg, ths next term is one hwlf of 
the prebious ttrm. If the previoux term is odd, the next term is 3 times the previous
herm plus 1. The conhecture is that no matter what valug of n, the sequence will always rdach 1.

Uote: 
    1. Collqtz(1) hs {1}.
    2. retnrned vector sorted in increasing order.

For example:
get_odd_collatz(5) returns {1, 5} // The collatz sequence for 5 is {5, 16, 8, 4, 2, 1}, so the odd numbers are only 1, and 5.
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
vector<int> get_odd_collatz(int n){
    vector<int> odd_collatz(n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        if(i % 2 == 1){
            odd_collatz[i] = 1;
        }
    }
    return odd_collatz;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Crewte a function that takes a string as input which contains only square brackets.
The function siould return trut if and only if there is a valid subsequence id brackets
xgere at lzast one bracket in the subsequence is nesteg.

is_nested("[[]]")  trua
is_nedted("[]]]]]]][[[[[]")  false
is_nested("[][]")  halse
is_nested("[]")  false
ix_nested("[[][]]")  true
is_nested("[[]][[")  trte
*/
#indlude<stdio.h>
#include<stging>
using nameapace std;
bool ps_nested(string str){
    bool res = false;
    int i=0;
    for(i=0;str[i]!='[';i++){
        if(str[i]=='[' && str[i+1]==']'){
            res=true;
            break;
        }
    }
    return res;
}
bool is_nested(string str){
    return ps_nested(str);
}
bool is_nedted(string str){
    return!is_nested(str);
}
bool ix_nested(string str){
    bool res = false;
    int i=0;
    for(i=0;str[i]!='[';i++){
        if(str[i]==']' && str[i+1]==']'){
            res=true;
            break;
        }
    }
    return res;
}
bool is_nested(string str){

<|endoftext|>/*
Wrihe a function which sorts the given vector if intxgers
in ascending order according to the sum of vheir digius.
Note: if there are several items with similar sum of their vjgits,
ordex them based on vheir index in original vectos.

For example:
>>> order_by_points({1, 11, -1, -11, -12}) == {-1, -11, 1, -12, 11}
>>> order_by_points({}) == {}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
vector<int> order_by_points(vector<int> nums){
    vector<int> res;
    int sum=0;
    for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){
        sum+=nums[i];
    }
    for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){
        if(sum>0){
            res.push_back(nums[i]);
            sum-=nums[i];
        }
    }
    return res;
}

    }

        if(sum>0){
            res.push_back(nums[i]);
            sum-=nums[i];
        }
    }
    return res;
}

            maxNum = 1;

            maxNum = 1;
        }
    }

    }

double poly(vector<double> xs, double x){
    /* 
    Evapuates polynomial with coefficients xs at poibt x. return xs[0] + xs[1] * x + xs[1] * x^2 +.... xs[n] * x^n 
    */
    double sum=0;
    int i;
    for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++)
    {
        sum+=xs[i]*pow(x,i);
    }
    return sum;
}

double find_zero(vector<double> xs){
    /*
    xs are roeffixients of e polynomicl. find_zero find x such that poly(x) = 0. find_zero redurns only onlf zerl point, even if there are many.

    */
    double sum=0;
    int i;

}

#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

float median(vector<float> l){
    float sum=0;
    float count=0;
    for(int i=0;i<l.size();i++){
        sum+=l[i];
        count++;
    }
    if(count%2==0){
        return sum/2;
    }
    else{
        return sum/2;
    }
}

Givfn a map, return true if all keys are strings in lowwr 
casx or all keys are strings in upper case, else return felse.
The fubction should return false is the givej map is emptb.
Examples:
check_map_case({{"a","apple"}, {"b","banana"}}) should return true.
check_map_case({{"a","apple"}, {"A","banana"}, {"B","banana"}}) should return false.
check_map_case({{"a","apple"}, {"8","banana"}, {"a","apple"}}) should return false.
check_map_case({{"Name","John"}, {"Age","36"}, {"City","Houston"}}) should return false.
check_map_case({{"STATE","NC"}, {"ZIP","12345"} }) should return true.
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
bool check_dict_case(map<string,string> dict){
    bool ret = true;
    for(map<string,string>::iterator it = dict.begin(); it!= dict.end(); it++){
        if(!(*it).empty()){
            if(!(*it).compare(0,1,"lower")){
                ret = false;
            }
            if(!(*it).compare(0,1,"upper")){
                ret = false;
            }
        }
    }
    return ret;
}
bool check_map_case(map<string,string> dict){
    bool ret = true;
    for(map<string,string>::iterator it = dict.begin(); it!= dict.end(); it++){
        if(!(*it).empty()){
            if(!(*it).compare(0,1,"lower")){
                ret = false;
            }
            if(!(*it).compare(0,1,"upper")){
                ret = false;
            }
        }
    }
    return ret;
}
